TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 101
TEI.2.document_title: Moses and James Austin to Falconer and Comegys, 01-17-1806

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 101

div1.p: Six months after date, We promise to Falconer and Comegys—or order, One thousand four hundred, twenty-three Dollars; and ninety cents value received at Camp Roudy—
[On the reverse:] Received Ste Genevieve Oct: 23, 1807, payment of the within, agreeably to our acct. current, rendered of this date—
